name: Puffs
description:
Oh no! These cute little adorable Puffs have mysteriously appeared on your attic. Get rid of them before they create too much dust on your home. Are you ready?

*CONNECT two or more Puffs with the same color to clean them out.

* VENTURE through fun and addicting levels with varying difficulties.

* CHALLENGE your Facebook friends to have the top score in the Puffs leaderboard

* STRATEGIZE by making a square of Puffs with single color to earn more points.

* PLAY to create the perfect move in this highly addictive game of puzzle

* EXPERIENCE fun game mechanics by breaking ice and rocks and extinguishing fire.

* POWER UP to clean more Puffs and earn points!
